title: English Writing Competency Enhancement Program Using Reflective Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Writing Structure Comprehension
context.additional_context: Project-based English writing education for science majors. Emphasizes reflective journaling and feedback routines using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to systematically apply reflective thinking processes in academic writing within eight weeks
Learners can revise and refine their English writing drafts at least three times based on structured feedback from peers and instructors
Learners demonstrate metacognition by analyzing and evaluating their writing development process through digital portfolios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
